abstract: He submitted paperwork to appear on the ballot in the March 13 primary, and basked in the warmth of followers.
snippet: He submitted paperwork to appear on the ballot in the March 13 primary, and basked in the warmth of followers.
lead_paragraph: HOMEWOOD, Ala. -- Herman Cain steered his unconventional presidential campaign on Friday to Alabama, where he submitted paperwork to appear on the ballot in the March 13 primary - a date deep into the race when all but the strongest candidates presumably will have fallen out.
